text: When I notice profit opportunities, I recognize them and choose to understand the system and create value instead.
During moments when money flow slows, I notice it and choose to identify bottlenecks and improve flow instead.
When I feel the pull to react to surface problems, I notice it and choose to understand the system underneath instead.
I let not being able to understand profit systems prevent me from identifying opportunities and creating value effectively.
When I notice myself thinking strategically about profit, I recognize it and choose to maintain those system-thinking patterns.
I see when profit needs improvement, and I choose to identify bottlenecks and increase flow instead.
When I feel the urge to focus on surface problems, I notice it and choose to understand the system underneath instead.
I let not identifying profit opportunities prevent me from understanding systems and creating value effectively.
When I notice profit thinking working, I recognize it and choose to strengthen those strategic patterns.
I recognize when money flow needs improvement, and I choose to identify bottlenecks and increase flow instead.
When I feel the pull to react without understanding, I notice it and choose to understand the system first instead.
I let problems from not understanding systems prevent me from identifying profit opportunities and creating value.
When I notice strategic profit thinking working, I recognize it and choose to strengthen those system patterns.
I see when profit opportunities appear, and I choose to understand the system and create value instead.
When I feel the urge to focus on symptoms, I notice it and choose to understand the root system instead.
I let not being able to identify bottlenecks prevent me from understanding systems and creating profit effectively.
When I notice myself maintaining profit instinct, I recognize it and choose to strengthen those patterns.
I recognize when profit needs strategic thinking, and I choose to understand systems and identify opportunities instead.
When I feel the pull to react to problems, I notice it and choose to understand the underlying system instead.
I let not identifying profit instinct abilities prevent me from understanding systems and creating value effectively.
